verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jerusalem, my happy home, when shall I come to thee? When shall my sorrows have an end? Thy joys, when shall I see?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: O happy harbor of the saints, O sweet and pleasant soil! In thee no sorrow may be found, no grief, no care, no toil.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Jerusalem, Jerusalem, God grant that I may see thine endless joy, and of the same partaker ever be!
